title: My game STILL won't load since updating to Windows 10 years ago
body:
I try around 10 times a year to get this damn game going, but no matter what I do my game will not start. I've put in tickets, nothing they suggest works, I rage, I give up. Today I removed EVERYTHING from my computer regarding the game and it's files, and re-downloaded only to be told "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" (http://i.imgur.com/dCniTWf.png?1) and I don't know what to do.

My specs are:

http://i.imgur.com/HJKrZbC.png?1
http://i.imgur.com/BD00POY.png?1

I am at a loss of what to do. This only happened AFTER upgrading to Windows 10, and next to gambling that fart several years back "upgrading" was the worst decision I've ever made.

replies.body: This kernel error is usually caused by a security setting, either with your OS or even antivirus, that's blocking the patcher from launching.  You'll want to run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and add league as an exception.  That should do it!
why do things like this exist?! Oh my god such a simple fix, thank you, I feel utterly stupid now ahahaha
Some folks and especially business like to have that extra security just to be safe!  Glad everything is working out for you now!
